body:
I bumped the VM-level timeout from 30 minutes to 45 minutes, but it was about to be killed, so I manually gave it another 20 minutes right before it got killed.

It's still going, at 47 minutes...

```

ok  	shift2.go	3.400s

ok  	sigchld.go	0.000s
ok  	simassign.go	6.877s
ok  	sinit.go	0.000s
ok  	sinit_run.go	10.878s
ok  	sizeof.go	6.879s
ok  	slice3.go	15.650s
```
